mapper.select: SELECT * FROM NOTICE ORDER BY NOTICE_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE(NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_DATE, NOTICE_VIEW, NOTICE_CONTENT) VALUES(SEQ_NOTICE.NEXTVAL, #{noticeTitle}, SYSDATE, 0, #{noticeContent})
mapper.update: update notice set notice_view=notice_view+1 where notice_no=#{noticeNo}
